description:
The [Filecoin Data Portal](https://filecoindataportal.xyz/) has continued evolving and growing in the last few months! New dashboards, datasets, metrics and reports are out there. Let's take a look at the biggest impact areas.

- The portal is now serving the [main OKRs/KPIs](https://numbers.filecoindataportal.xyz/kpis) view into the ecosystem. Actively used by teams to drive meetings like WBR.
- Refreshed the look of the [main dashboards](https://numbers.filecoindataportal.xyz/) and added more than 15 new charts.
- Served more than 100 ad-hoc data requests.
- Added [more than 20 new metrics](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/u/1/d/1uq9J_WTJO6kAvQlrqkqR8GHfQfh3SJ84OSj88Mff6vY/edit?usp=sharing).
- Helped uncover and analyze bugs (e.g: state related to FIP-0074 not being cleaned up as expected).
- Continued providing up to date metrics to VCs and stakeholders.
- Curated 5 new completely new datasets (custom onramps mapping and details, new allocator details, filecoin market price and volume, ...)
- All while keeping all code open and using public infrastructure. You can clone the repo and reproduce eveything in your laptop!

You can [check the commits to see all details](https://github.com/davidgasquez/filecoin-data-portal/commits/main/) too!
additional_impact: There have been other initiatives that the Filecoin Data Portal has driven but haven't materialized for now. E.g: the [Filecoin Storage Providers Market Dashboard](https://filecoin-project.github.io/filecoin-storage-providers-market/). There are also a a few [experimental dashboards](https://nexusdatalabs.github.io/filecoin-watch/clients/?page=1&sort=total_deals&dir=desc) in the works!
end_user:
- Stakeholders
- Teams in need of open and eaisly accessible metrics
- Overall ecosystem players looking for the state of it
- VCs
testimonials: No direct links to testimonials but stakeholders are very happy with the data platform and dashboards!
top_five_dependents:
- Filecoin Foundation KPIs and OKRs
- [Filecoin in Numbers](https://numbers.filecoindataportal.xyz/)
- [Filecoin Pulse](https://pulse.filecoindataportal.xyz/)
- VCs looking at SP metrics
- [Dune Dashboard](https://dune.com/kalen/filecoin-daily-metrics)
